text: Abdourahmane Barry (born 21 February 2000) is a French professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for SpVgg Greuther Fürth. == Club career == Barry made his 2. Liga debut on 27 July 2018 against SV Horn. He played the full game. On 10 July 2020, Barry's contract with FC Red Bull Salzburg was terminated. In August, Barry joined 2. Bundesliga club SpVgg Greuther Fürth signing a two-year contract with the option of a third year. == Personal life == Born in France, Barry is of Guinean descent. == References== == External links== Category:Living people Category:2000 births Category:People from Courbevoie Category:Sportspeople from Hauts-de-Seine Category:Association football defenders Category:French footballers Category:French people of Guinean descent Category:Austrian Football Second League players Category:FC Liefering players Category:SpVgg Greuther Fürth players Category:French expatriate footballers Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Austria Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria
title: Abdourahmane Barry
